title: The Launch: Fashion News to Know This June
excerpt: Plus, more fashion news to know (and shop) this month.
text: June’s lineup of drops, collaborations, and store openings is set to gear you up for everything summer has in store. To get started, Agua by Agua Bendita and Andrea Wild Botero teamed up for a capsule rife with intricate embroideries; plus, Frame and Sotheby’s dropped a perfectly preppy collection. From major fashion moments to can’t-miss releases, here’s everything you need to know this month.Gap and Malbon Partner on a Golf CapsuleCourtesy of GapWho: Gap What: Capsule collection with Malbon GolfWhere: Online at gap.comWhy: The weather is heating up, and so is the competition on the course. Blending classic prep style with athleticism, Gap and Malbon have partnered to release a 33-piece capsule that bridges the sport’s iconic style across every generation. Reimagined pieces include preppy polos, stylish Bermuda shorts, cable-knit vests, and perfectly worn-in T-shirts emblazoned with “PAR.” The collaboration launches alongside the “Generation Golf” campaign, shot by Duncan Wolf and starring five-time PGA tour winner Jesper Parnevik, as well as his children, Phoenix and Peg Parnevik—turning the event into a family affair. Gap x Malbon Baseball HatGap x Malbon Crop Polo SweaterGap × Malbon Plaid Pleated Mini SkortMoncler Releases a New Footwear CollectionCourtrsy of MonclerWho: MonclerWhat: Third edition of Studio AscentiWhere: New York CityWhy: Moncler knows how to unveil a new collection, and for the third edition of Studio Ascenti—the open-format experiential footwear space which first launched in Milan and Paris—the brand brought footwear enthusiasts high above the New York City skyline. A new “family” of footwear, the Moncler Altive, was introduced, while three new iterations were added to the Moncler Trailgrip family along with special collabs from fashion insiders and celeb friends like Rick Owens, Donald Glover, and Willow Smith.Moncler Trailgrip GTX SneakersMoncler Trailgrip Momint Nubuck & Suede SneakersMoncler Trailgrip Knit High Top SneakersCasablanca Opens a Flagship Store in Pariscourtesy of CasablancaWho: CasablancaWhat: Flagship boutiqueWhere: ParisWhy: Casablanca is going worldwide. For the first time, the brand will open its doors in Paris on the iconic Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré—a sort of homecoming for designer and founder Charaf Tajer, who was born in the French capital. The exterior blends seamlessly with the classic architecture of the prestigious 8th arrondissement, meanwhile, the inside represents Casablanca’s contemporary DNA. Interior aesthetics channel a myriad of inspirations, including Japanese futurism, ancient Greece, and Stanley Kubrick’s 2001: A Space Odyssey. The boutique was created in partnership with London-based designers Counterfeit Studio and Moroccan architecture firm Elements Lab.Casablanca Cotton Tuck Stitch Cropped Polo ShirtCasablanca Crystal Embellished Denim ShortsCasablanca Colourblock SwimsuitAgua by Agua Bendita Taps Andrea Wild Botero for a Limited-Edition CapsuleCourtesy of Agua by Agua BenditaWho: Agua by Agua BenditaWhat: Capsule collection with Andrea Wild Botero Where: Online at overthemoon.comWhy: Agua by Agua Bendita continues to craft the perfect summer wardrobe. This season, the Colombian brand is teaming up with independent artist Andrea Wild Botero for a capsule collection filled with embroideries inspired by her childhood in Cartagena. “This collaboration is a celebration of our shared love for Latin America and our commitment to exhibit the unexplored beauty of our region,” Mariana Hinestroza and Catalina Álvarez, co-founders and creative directors of the brand, said in a statement. Titled “Wild,” the 16-piece collab is filled with beautiful motifs depicting vegetation and wildlife, all nostalgic to Botero and signature to Agua by Agua Bendita designs. Silhouettes include flowing midis, textured minidresses, wrap skirts, and one-piece bathing suits in ornate patterns, perfect for any warm-weather occasion. Agua by Agua Bendita Illusion One-PieceAgua by Agua Bendita Lima Mini DressAgua by Agua Bendita Lavanda PareoFrame and Sotheby’s Release a Capsule CollectionCourtesy of David William Baum/FrameWho: FrameWhat: Exclusive capsule collectionWhere: Online at frame-store.comWhy: Frame and Sotheby’s have confirmed that ’80s New York will never go out of style. This summer, the two have teamed up to release an all-new collaboration that honors the art auctioneer’s 281-year legacy and inspires the next generation of collectors. From oversized blazers to argyle sweaters and retro T-shirts cheekily emblazoned with “COLLECTOR,” the pieces are perfect for Gen Zers who aspire to dress like Carolyn Bessette Kennedy, off-duty Wall Street bros, and any prepster in between. Frame Classic TeeFrame Baseball CapFrame V-Neck Sweater
html:
June’s lineup of drops, collaborations, and store openings is set to gear you up for everything summer has in store. To get started, Agua by Agua Bendita and Andrea Wild Botero teamed up for a capsule rife with intricate embroideries; plus, Frame and Sotheby’s dropped a perfectly preppy collection. From major fashion moments to can’t-miss releases, here’s everything you need to know this month.

Gap and Malbon Partner on a Golf Capsule

Who: Gap

What: Capsule collection with Malbon Golf

Where: Online at gap.com

Why: The weather is heating up, and so is the competition on the course. Blending classic prep style with athleticism, Gap and Malbon have partnered to release a 33-piece capsule that bridges the sport’s iconic style across every generation. Reimagined pieces include preppy polos, stylish Bermuda shorts, cable-knit vests, and perfectly worn-in T-shirts emblazoned with “PAR.” The collaboration launches alongside the “Generation Golf” campaign, shot by Duncan Wolf and starring five-time PGA tour winner Jesper Parnevik, as well as his children, Phoenix and Peg Parnevik—turning the event into a family affair.

Gap x Malbon Baseball Hat

Gap x Malbon Crop Polo Sweater

Gap × Malbon Plaid Pleated Mini Skort

Moncler Releases a New Footwear Collection

Who: Moncler

What: Third edition of Studio Ascenti

Where: New York City

Why: Moncler knows how to unveil a new collection, and for the third edition of Studio Ascenti—the open-format experiential footwear space which first launched in Milan and Paris—the brand brought footwear enthusiasts high above the New York City skyline. A new “family” of footwear, the Moncler Altive, was introduced, while three new iterations were added to the Moncler Trailgrip family along with special collabs from fashion insiders and celeb friends like Rick Owens, Donald Glover, and Willow Smith.

Moncler Trailgrip GTX Sneakers

Moncler Trailgrip Momint Nubuck & Suede Sneakers

Moncler Trailgrip Knit High Top Sneakers

Casablanca Opens a Flagship Store in Paris

Who: Casablanca

What: Flagship boutique

Where: Paris

Why: Casablanca is going worldwide. For the first time, the brand will open its doors in Paris on the iconic Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré—a sort of homecoming for designer and founder Charaf Tajer, who was born in the French capital. The exterior blends seamlessly with the classic architecture of the prestigious 8th arrondissement, meanwhile, the inside represents Casablanca’s contemporary DNA. Interior aesthetics channel a myriad of inspirations, including Japanese futurism, ancient Greece, and Stanley Kubrick’s 2001: A Space Odyssey. The boutique was created in partnership with London-based designers Counterfeit Studio and Moroccan architecture firm Elements Lab.

Casablanca Cotton Tuck Stitch Cropped Polo Shirt

Casablanca Crystal Embellished Denim Shorts

Casablanca Colourblock Swimsuit

Agua by Agua Bendita Taps Andrea Wild Botero for a Limited-Edition Capsule

Who: Agua by Agua Bendita

What: Capsule collection with Andrea Wild Botero

Where: Online at overthemoon.com

Why: Agua by Agua Bendita continues to craft the perfect summer wardrobe. This season, the Colombian brand is teaming up with independent artist Andrea Wild Botero for a capsule collection filled with embroideries inspired by her childhood in Cartagena. “This collaboration is a celebration of our shared love for Latin America and our commitment to exhibit the unexplored beauty of our region,” Mariana Hinestroza and Catalina Álvarez, co-founders and creative directors of the brand, said in a statement. Titled “Wild,” the 16-piece collab is filled with beautiful motifs depicting vegetation and wildlife, all nostalgic to Botero and signature to Agua by Agua Bendita designs. Silhouettes include flowing midis, textured minidresses, wrap skirts, and one-piece bathing suits in ornate patterns, perfect for any warm-weather occasion.

Agua by Agua Bendita Illusion One-Piece

Agua by Agua Bendita Lima Mini Dress

Agua by Agua Bendita Lavanda Pareo

Frame and Sotheby’s Release a Capsule Collection

Who: Frame

What: Exclusive capsule collection

Where: Online at frame-store.com

Why: Frame and Sotheby’s have confirmed that ’80s New York will never go out of style. This summer, the two have teamed up to release an all-new collaboration that honors the art auctioneer’s 281-year legacy and inspires the next generation of collectors. From oversized blazers to argyle sweaters and retro T-shirts cheekily emblazoned with “COLLECTOR,” the pieces are perfect for Gen Zers who aspire to dress like Carolyn Bessette Kennedy, off-duty Wall Street bros, and any prepster in between.

Frame Classic Tee

Frame Baseball Cap

Frame V-Neck Sweater
